strings:
<voice_0x010009C4><se_low>*: Hm?
I don't often get visitors all the way up here!
<voice_0x010009C5><se_low>*: Well, now that you're here, maybe I could ask you a little favour?
<voice_0x010009CC><se_low>*: I was sure you'd say yes. I mean, you must have plenty of time on your hands to have come all the way up here.
<voice_0x010009CD><se_low>*: Still, not my place to try and talk you into it.
<voice_0x010009CE><se_low>*: Hm? Have you changed your mind about helpin' me out?

<voice_0x010009C6><se_low>*: Okay, I'm only goin' to say this once,
so clean out your ears and get listenin'.
<voice_0x010009C7><se_low>*: If you go outside and look at the view from the top of the mountain, you should be able to spot a tree with red leaves.
<voice_0x010009C8><se_low>*: I had a bit of a kip there when I was out the other day, and it seems I left my tool bag behind.
<voice_0x010009C9><se_low>*: I don't expect you to do this for free of course. I'll be able to give you a small reward.
<voice_0x010009CA><se_low>*: I'll be waitin' here in my hut for you to bring it back. Try not to take too long.

<voice_0x010009CF><se_low>*: Hm? Didn't you follow what I was sayin'?
I told you I was only goin' to explain it once!
<voice_0x010009D1><se_low>*: Go on! Get out of here!

<voice_0x010009D2><se_low>*: Er, I shouldn't have lost my rag like that.
Not when you were doin' me a favour. Sorry.
<voice_0x010009D3><se_low>*: Anyway, all I want you to do is bring back somethin' of mine that I left under the red tree. You can see it easily from up here on the mountain.

<voice_0x010009D4><se_low>*: It won't be anythin' grand, but I will be
able to give you a small reward if you help me out here.
